file_content.text: Clear!
Clear!
That won't be the last of them. Dengril, Xaban, split north. Abbeth, Torg, south. Kanner, take Theron, fastest route back to camp. We'll regroup there.
You, with me. We're covering the retreat.
Your squad is in good hands, Major.
Count on me.
I'll support you however I can.
Count on me.
And who's going to cover our retreat?
What about us?
That's what I thought....
For a moment, I thought you'd suggest we flee.
Good.
I believe you've mistaken what subordinates are for.
Shouldn't they be covering us?
I don't view leadership as a privilege, Sith.
It'll cost you.
I should really bill for this.
Joking, Major.
Let's see if you can use that rifle half as well as you claim.
I'll be judging.
You'll find out.
We'll cover their retreat. Just like old times.
Been a while since I've taken your orders, Jorgan. I might be rusty.
Only we're a lot less green.
Just don't let the new blood show you up. We've got a reputation to maintain.
We stand a better chance of fighting them off by sticking together.
Splitting up is a mistake.
Fighting them off is an unnecessary risk.
If we're caught out, your operation here is over.
We're mission critical.
Worst case, Kanner and Theron take over, but I don't plan to give up my command that easy.
The Skytroopers have numbers and mobility. Losing them is going to take misdirection.
I need a good vantage.
